backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor defining storage maps, types, and state for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, and activity tracking.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting pond member lists from Principals to Text identifiers and producing a new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report linking a frontend feature update to specific files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and UI behavior of various frontend files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide explaining prerequisites and steps for deploying the Ribbit application to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the frontend root element and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Bash script automating backend binding generation, frontend build, and canister deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application wiring routes, layout, theme provider, and Froggy Phrase initialization.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Button component that toggles bookmark state for a lily using useBookmarks.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Renders an individual comment with avatar, timestamp, content, and optional like/reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Component showing interactive emoji reaction buttons with counts and hover/selection states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links and a credit message.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main header with navigation, search, user avatar, and mobile interactions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps page layout with header, footer, and mobile sidebar drawer control.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Displays the left navigation menu and recent activity list, highlighting active routes.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Shows a lily post preview with avatar, metadata, image, and interaction buttons.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Displays images with aspect‑ratio handling and optional blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 images.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Provides a mobile slide‑in drawer containing the left sidebar and handles body scroll lock.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows detailed pond information, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Renders a join button for pond cards, handling join actions and states.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header showing pond banner, profile info, and navigation tabs for feed and about.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Card component rendering post metadata, content preview, image, tags, and vote/comment/view stats.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Displays a user's ribbit with avatar, linked post title, timestamp, and link to view the conversation.
Popover tray offering quick emoji reactions and invoking a callback on selection.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Renders a threaded ribbit with avatar, timestamp, likes, and reply form, handling like and reply actions.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Loads an avatar image with a tiny blurred placeholder and smooth transition, supporting avatar or img modes.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts based on fetched data.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Mobile full‑screen search modal showing trending searches and suggestions with input handling.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Desktop search dropdown displaying trending searches or suggestions based on query state.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar displaying top, trending, and newest tags using reusable tag stats modules.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers around TabsList and TabsTrigger with underline-specific classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading identities and exposing login and clear methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query currently matches using a React hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for ponds, profiles, and related mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, and custom utilities for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notation such as k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseWordList.ts: Exports frog-related terms and a large word list used for Froggy Phrase generation.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Provides client-side image validation, resizing, and compression while preserving animated GIFs.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates, normalizes, and provides error messages for pond names using alphanumeric rules.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds deterministically by lilyCount, memberCount, and name, returning a rank map.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link via Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns related error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identity, settings, and Froggy Phrase generation/storage via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily cooldown tracking using timestamps in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page describing the Ribbit platform, its features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a list of all ponds with ranking, join controls, loading states, and navigation to create or view ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a lily with text, image, or link, including tag suggestions, image compression, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements a pond creation form with validation and image upload/compression for banner and profile images.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Offers a post creation interface supporting text, image, or link posts with pond selection and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile with avatar, stats, posts, and comments using tabs and loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main feed of lilies with trending/new sorting, search handling, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Renders a single lily with ribbits, likes, views, and image handling, including submission and view-count increment logic.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed pond info, moderators, visibility, join/leave actions, and loading/not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond's feed of lilies with sorting, sidebars, mobile header, and loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays a single post with metadata, media, threaded comments, and a form for submitting new comments.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows locally bookmarked lilies and allows removing individual bookmarks.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Lists top, trending, and newest tags with stats and navigation to each tag page.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Shows lilies for a specific tag with sorting, canonical redirects, and subcategory display.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings including username changes, avatar upload, pond management, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme colors, containers, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for fixing pond membership issues caused by mixed identity systems. Lists architectural notes, known issues, existing features, and new backend migration and identity-consistency feature requests.
